# Simple test code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Create some data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Create a plot
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Sine Wave')
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.grid(True)
plt.savefig('sine_wave.png')

print('Successfully created sine wave plot')
print(f'Data points: {len(x)}')
